caption.center: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Appellee v. TYRONE UPSHUR, Appellant.

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Eastern District.

opinion.posture:
No. 19 EAP 2001, Appeal from the order of Superior Court entered on 12/7/2000 at 162 PHL 98 affirming the judgment of sentence entered on 7/22/1997 in the Court of Common Pleas, Philadelphia County, Criminal Division at No. 046 June Term 1996.
Prior Report: 2000 Pa.Super. 376, 764 A.2d 69.
opinion.attorneys:
Daniel A. Rendline, Philadelphia, for Tyrone Upshur.
Catherine Lynn Marshall, Philadelphia, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
opinion.panel: Before ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, J.J.
opinion.opinion_text:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Mr. Chief Justice Flaherty did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.Page 590
